text:
MEMORANDUM
TO? ALL MEMBERS OP REGION II
FROM:EARL WYNN, DIRECTOR, REGION II
DATE: March 31, 1954
Since interest on the part of a faithful few
only has been registered for our proposed re-
gional NAEB meeting in Atlanta April 30 and
May 1, I have had to make title decision to cancel
the meeting at least temporarily* However, I
will be in Columbus. I hope that many of you
will also be there. Let ua attempt to get our
heads together for a three or four hour session
one afternoon and make a final decision on this
regional meeting as well as, I hope, some re-
commendations regionÂ®wise for Headquarters.
When and if you arrive at Columbus, please leave
a message in my box at the Deshler=Hi 1 ton Hotel
indicating where you are staying so that I might
get in touch with you.
I look forward to seeing many of you In Columbus
